<GAZE(student)> Maps can have different scales <POINT(scale)>, depending on what people want to use them for. For example, <ANIMATE(metaphoricScaleUp)> large scale maps are better for showing individual buildings in detail because they only cover a small area of land <ANIMATE(metaphoricScaleDown)>. But small scale maps are ideal for travelling either by car or walking because they cover large areas of land <ANIMATE(metaphoricWorld)>.
